name: DmC Devil May Cry
description: Disable joysticks in the joystick controller panel. This is only possible with Lutris 0.4.20 and above. This prevents the game from crashing after the AMD logo when a controller is plugged in. This won't prevent controllers from working in-game.
content:
game:
  appid: 220440
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet40
    arch: win32
    description: Installing components
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: false
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win32
    description: Changing system version
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
winesteam:
  autoconf_joypad: false
  version: tkg-protonified-3.21-x86_64
